name: Lost In Transit (itch) (ZevDev)
description:
As a DOWNS delivery service employee, you have to deal with low pay, angry customers, and terrible benefits. Every day you want to quit - but if you get fired, you'll get an unemployed bonus. It seems that failing your job is the best way to leave, and you'll get the nice bonus you really don't deserve.

There's an in-game tutorial as well.

  • Use A and D to move left and right
  • Press Space to jump
  • Press E to pick up or throw the package
  • Press E while holding shift to drop the package
  • Press R to restart

Objectives

  • Damage the package until the health bar is green
  • Don't completely destroy the package
  • Deliver the damaged package to the house
